name: No Mercy "Arena"
description:
Hi everyone, No mercy "Arena", is the wave based arena version of my first game "No Mercy", all the systems have been improved and many things have been added, the game has still room for improvement so there will be one or 2 updates with more maps, interactive maps, more enemies and weapons and an extra level of polishing to the current gameplay.

There is no in game tutorial so this is how it works:

Controls:

  • Movement:  WASD.
  • Jump: Space.
  • Flashlight: F.
  • Crouch: C.
  • Shoot: Left click.
  • Special Secondary fire: Right click.
  • Use Medkit: Q
  • Change Weapon: 
  • Mouse scroll up = stronger weapon.
  • Mouse scroll down = weaker weapon.
  • Pause: ESC

Enemies:

There are 7 different enemy types and all of them have unique skills, each round a number of enemies will spawn, the higher you go the stronger the enemies will be.

From 0 to 5 only low tier enemies will spawn, every 5 rounds a stronger tier of enemies will be added to the pool, at level 15  all enemy type will spawn in mass to kill you.

Ammo, Meds, Armor:

Resources will periodically spawn in random position around the map, so always look inside building for more resources.

At the end of every round the Helicopter will release a cargo drop in the map with new weapons and resources like meds, armor and ammo, once the Helicopter has released all the weapons it will release double the ammount of resources from the cargo drop, so always keep an eye in the sky at the end of the round, the cargo drop has a green light and an alarm sound to make it easier to find in the map once the Helicopter drop it.

Weapons:

There are 4 different types of weapons at the moment, you will spawn with a automatic pistol, so if you spawn empty handed always remember to take the pistol out, every weapon has a special secondary fire that you can trigger with the right mouse button, (the pistol will not use ammo with the primary fire but will consume ammo using the special fire):

Pistol: LaserBeam "keep right mouse button pressed for continued fire".

Assault Rifle : Granade Laucher.

Heavy Machinegun: Double rate of fire "keep right mouse button pressed for continued fire".

Scout Rifle: Piercing Laser Shot.

How to Dowload:

  1. Download the file from the page.
  2. Don't start the game from the .7zip file, ensure you have a software capable of reading .7zip file, like winRar or winZip and extract the folder.
  3. In the folder double click the Icon with .exe at the end of the name.

                                                                Have fun guys!
